title: Lagging for no reason. Character out of Sync. Issue and Temp Fix
body: SO lately I had noticed my fps was lower than usual around 50-70 fps, my laptop is a Alienware 17 with a GTX970m So Im used to being around 200-300 fps, So what I did was Re-install NVIDIA and optimized the game again and it went back to actually even higher fps around 300-350 but my character was like spiking wherever I would command to go to. So I Reinstalled the game and still same issues. My Ping is always good around 50-55 ms. So then I was fed up and started messing with the FPS capping and I put it at  144 and it fixed it, everything seems to be okay. But seriously Why am I having to go down to such low fps??? I don't like this. anyone else know what could've happened?

replies.body: Your PC might just be too good, to be honest.  We actually have a [high specs guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) to help with specific cases like you, which does include setting a frame cap.  I'm glad everything is okay now!
